headline: ADP to Present at Upcoming Investor Conference
summary: ADP (Nasdaq: ADP), a leading global technology company providing human capital management (HCM) solutions, today announced that members of its management team will present at the J.P. Morgan Global Technology, Media and Communications Conference on Tuesday, May 13th, 2025.
